title: Summarize DataFrame [SPAC][DMAP]
description:
Creates a statistical summary of selected columns in the input dataframe, and generates an interactive report flagging the missing values (optionally listing their row indices).\
Please refer to [DUET Documentation](https://nidap.nih.gov/workspace/notepad/view/ri.notepad.main.notepad.822eecd8-51cc-43e4-bc0e-d8d257e9e4c9) and [GitHub Documentation](https://fnlcr-dmap.github.io/SCSAWorkflow/modules/spac.data_utils.summarize_dataframe.html#spac.data_utils.summarize_dataframe) for further information.

inputDatasets.description: Link to prior processed dataset in the analysis.

parameters.description: Print the indices of missing values for a specific column

code.codeTemplate:
def summarize_dataframe({{{Calculate_Centroids}}}):
    from spac.data_utils import summarize_dataframe
    from spac.visualization import present_summary_as_html
    from spac.visualization import present_summary_as_figure

    df = {{{Calculate_Centroids}}}
    columns = {{{Columns}}}
    print_missing_location = {{{Print_Missing_Location}}}
    summary = summarize_dataframe(
        df,
        columns=columns,
        print_nan_locations=print_missing_location)
        # Generate HTML from the summary.

    fig = present_summary_as_figure(summary)

    fig.show()  # Opens in an interactive Plotly window
